trans-unit.source: Represents a method that will handle the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting?displayProperty=fullName> attached event.
The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> attached event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste, but before the data is actually pasted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>貼上作業已選取要貼上的資料格式時，但實際貼上資料之前，就會發生附加的事件。</xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>

trans-unit.source: Actions typically performed by a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> attached event handler include: - Change the selected paste format by setting new value for the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動作通常是由<xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>附加的事件處理常式包括:-設定新值來變更選取貼上格式<xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>

trans-unit.source: - Apply a custom data format to the paste selection.
trans-unit.target: 貼上選取来套用自訂資料格式。

trans-unit.source: - Create a new <xref:System.Windows.DataObject>, and assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.DataObject%2A> property of `e`.
A read-only copy of the original data object is stored in <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 原始的資料物件的唯讀複本儲存在<xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cancel the paste operation by calling <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CancelCommand%2A>.
**Important** If the paste format is changed, the handler method is responsible for ensuring that a newly selected paste format is consumable by the paste target.
trans-unit.target: **重要**貼上格式已變更，如果處理常式方法會負責確保新選取貼上格式您可以使用貼上的目標。
